item.title: All Things Water Course II, Water Reclaim Systems
item.description: Part 1 of 3 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ffut3SxSaAs Advance your industry knowledge and expertise with All Things Water video courses featuring water treatment processes, water sector innovations, environmental challenges and public policies impacting the water industry. In this three-part Blacoh University course, industry expert Mark Girgenti discusses the fundamentals of water reclamation systems, system design sizing and feasibility. Part 2 of 3 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=taKAAZ4gmao Part 3 of 3 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vQaynF3qFDg
